title: League problems
body:
My client won't pass Champ Select. after the champ select goes through and ready for game to load it just doesn't load onto the game.
Any advice?

replies.body: restart the client again and reconnect . EZ

1. maybe try Restarting Computer??
2. Test your games
3. Try repairing your client
4. send a ticket to riot.

Good luck and hope you can fix your client.

1. Post in the right section.
2. Repair your client.
3. Play custom games to test.
4. Go here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
5. Sit down and cry because the only solution left is to send a support ticket. Oh how compassionate they are.
Well I recomend going to Help & Support for that my friend. It happened to me once but never again =/
